name: Kungfu Fighter - King of Combat
description:
Kung Street Fighting, A really classic but addictive fighting kungfu arcade game! The world's largest fighting contest is started! No ranking, no rules, only dead or alive! Now, a new powerful character appears.

Games fighting style biased tough, strong sense of combat, you show a true spirit of martial arts, so you have a different martial arts journey. Game, you play Fist of Legend, You should save a beautiful girl. In accordance with the development of the plot challenges one by one boss. I believe a lot of heroes in your heart there is a dream? This is the chance for you to become a real kungfu hero. Beat all of the bad guys.

Features:
- Easy to control.
- Great old-school art and animations
- Intuitive control and friendly user interface
- Almost play brutal hand to hand combat.
- Fast speed punch.
- Smooth fighting actions to try.
- Multiple Levels to challenge.
- Varieties of combination attacks.
- All is Free, no any in app purchase
